squidpony.squidgrid

Interface SGBlock

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SGImageBlock, SGTextBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiImageSGBlock, SingleImageSGBlock

    public interface SGBlock
    This interface guarantees access to certain common elements for data blocks associated with a monospaced display. Subclasses of this interface should specify how information is placed into the block.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
      Gets the primary image to be shown.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getNextImage()
      Gets the next image to be shown.
      java.awt.Dimension getSize() 

    • Method Detail

      • getNextImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getNextImage()
        Gets the next image to be shown. If this block contains only one image it will return that one image.
        Returns:

      • getImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage()
        Gets the primary image to be shown. If this block has multiple images, it is up to the implementation to determine which image is considered primary.
        Returns:

      • getSize

        java.awt.Dimension getSize()
        Returns:
        the size of the Block in pixels.
